Text: @tdk112: Funny...Furk dot net has a cached .zip of just the color illustrations you were looking for in 40 .pdf-s. Unfortunately it's for a 2001 edition, which doesn't jibe entirely with either this or the other upload.

@analien8mycat I know about the "illustrations", but those are just some PowerPoint slides for teachers. The actual book is not available on the Internet in color, or in high quality true PDF (or at least not that I know of).
